typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string,
		Column_5 as string,
		Column_6 as string,
		Column_7 as string,
		Column_8 as string,
		Column_9 as string,
		Column_10 as string,
		Column_11 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['clicksreamweblog_raw.txt']) ~> ADLS_GEN2_
ADLS_GEN2_ select(mapColumn(
		Column_1,
		Column_2,
		Column_3,
		Column_4,
		Column_5,
		Column_6,
		Column_7,
		Column_8,
		Column_9,
		Column_10,
		Column_11
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sort(asc(ERROR_FUNCTION(''), true)) ~> Sort 
Sort  filter(ERROR_FUNCTION('')) ~> Filter
